name: get_quotes_by_character_name
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool anime_quotes_v4.
Tool description: An API for serving high-quality anime quotes
API description: Fetch quotes from the Anime Quotes API for a given character name.

name.description: The name of the character for whom to fetch quotes.

page.description: The page number to retrieve, used for pagination. Defaults to 1.
